title: About me
description: Hello! My name is Rifat Hossain, and I’m a Flutter developer with over 4 years+ of experience building high-performance, cross-platform mobile applications. My journey into app development began with a passion for clean UI and seamless user experiences. Since then, I’ve contributed to a variety of projects, including POS systems, VPN apps, and e-commerce platforms. Here are some of the technologies I’ve been working with recently:
